lead_paragraph: For years Anthony J. Sgarlato could not work because of anger, depression and delusion. Though he now has a job and a fiancée, he is living paycheck to paycheck.

keywords.name: organizations

snippet: For years Anthony J. Sgarlato could not work because of anger, depression and delusion. Though he now has a job and a fiancée, he is living paycheck to paycheck.
